name: gss_buffer_set_desc_struct
desc: The structure for a buffer set descriptor that you use to manage an array of buffer descriptors.

items.name: var count: Int
items.desc: The number of buffer descriptors in the array.

items.name: var elements: UnsafeMutablePointer<gss_buffer_desc>!
items.desc: A pointer to an array of buffer descriptors.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Initialize a new, empty buffer set.

items.name: init(count: Int, elements: UnsafeMutablePointer<gss_buffer_desc>!)
items.desc: Initialize a new buffer set with the given buffers.
